body: Great insights on AI automation! We should discuss how this applies to our industry. Can you email me at alex.chen@techcorp.com?
Hi! I saw your profile and think you'd be perfect for a consulting project we have. Are you available for a quick call this week?

I'd like to connect. I'm interested in AI solutions for enterprise automation.
